name: proxly
description: Easiest way to create a single proxy to a list of functions or objects

scripts.build: npm run build-d && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-d: rollup index.js --o dist/proxly.js --f iife --name "proxly" && npm run minify-d
scripts.build-umd: rollup index.js --o dist/proxly.umd.js --f umd --name "proxly" && npm run minify-umd

author: Preet Shihn <preetshihn@gmail.com>
